package.name: arrows-and-pointers
package.author: Stib
package.description: expanded set of arrows and pointers
package.title: Arrows and Pointers

manifest.author: Stib
manifest.description: expanded set of arrows and pointers
manifest.name: arrows-and-pointers
manifest.title: Arrows and Pointers

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:

# LEFTWARDS ARROW
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "←"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "↢"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⇽"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "☜"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "↤"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⇤"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "↼"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "↽"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "↞"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "↜"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⇜"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "↩"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "↫"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⇐"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⇚"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⇇"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⇠"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⇷"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⇺"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "↚"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⤺"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⇦"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⬅"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⇷"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⇺"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⯇"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⮘"
  - triggers: [":<-:", ":lef", ":lf", ":wes", ":wst"]
    replace: "⮜"
    
# RIGHTWARDS ARROW
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "→"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "↣"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇾"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "☞"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇨"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⮕"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇢"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "↦"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇰"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇥"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇀"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇁"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "↠"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "↝"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "↪"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⤻"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "↬"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇉"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇒"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇛"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇝"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇶"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇶"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇸"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇴"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⇻"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "↛"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⯈"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⮚"
  - triggers: [":->", ":rig", ":rt", ":eas", ":est"]
    replace: "⮞"

# UPWARDS ARROW
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "↑"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "☝"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⇧"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⬆"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "↟"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "↥"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⇫"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⇬"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⇭"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "↾"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "↿"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⇮"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⇯"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⇈"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⇑"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⇡"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⇪"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⯅"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⮙"
  - triggers: [":|^", ":^|:", ":up", ":nor", ":nth"]
    replace: "⮝"

# DOWNWARDS ARROW
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "↓"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "☟"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "⬇"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "⇩"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "↡"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "↧"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "↯"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "⇂"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "⇃"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "⇊"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "⇓"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "⇣"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "⤸"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "⤹"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "⯆"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "⮛"
  - triggers: [":v|:", ":|v", ":sou", ":sth"]
    replace: "⮟"

# NORTH WEST ARROW
  - triggers: [":<\\:", ":^\\", ":nw", ":NW"]
    replace: "↖"
  - triggers: [":<\\:", ":^\\", ":nw", ":NW"]
    replace: "⇖"
  - triggers: [":<\\:", ":^\\", ":nw", ":NW"]
    replace: "⬉"
  - triggers: [":<\\:", ":^\\", ":nw", ":NW"]
    replace: "⇱"
  - triggers: [":<\\:", ":^\\", ":nw", ":NW"]
    replace: "↰"
  - triggers: [":<\\:", ":^\\", ":nw", ":NW"]
    replace: "⮢"
  - triggers: [":<\\:", ":^\\", ":nw", ":NW"]
    replace: "⮤"

# NORTH EAST ARROW
  - triggers: [":/>", ":/^",":ne", ":NE"]
    replace: "↗"
  - triggers: [":/>", ":/^",":ne", ":NE"]
    replace: "⇗"
  - triggers: [":/>", ":/^",":ne", ":NE"]
    replace: "⬈"
  - triggers: [":/>", ":/^",":ne", ":NE"]
    replace: "⤴"
  - triggers: [":/>", ":/^",":ne", ":NE"]
    replace: "↱"
  - triggers: [":/>", ":/^",":ne", ":NE"]
    replace: "⮣"
  - triggers: [":/>", ":/^",":ne", ":NE"]
    replace: "⮥"

# SOUTH EAST ARROW
  - triggers: [":\\>", ":\\v", ":se", ":SE"]
    replace: "↘"
  - triggers: [":\\>", ":\\v", ":se", ":SE"]
    replace: "⇘"
  - triggers: [":\\>", ":\\v", ":se", ":SE"]
    replace: "⬊"
  - triggers: [":\\>", ":\\v", ":se", ":SE"]
    replace: "⇲"
  - triggers: [":\\>", ":\\v", ":se", ":SE"]
    replace: "⤵"
  - triggers: [":\\>", ":\\v", ":se", ":SE"]
    replace: "⤷"
  - triggers: [":\\>", ":\\v", ":se", ":SE"]
    replace: "↳"
  - triggers: [":\\>", ":\\v", ":se", ":SE"]
    replace: "⮡"
  - triggers: [":\\>", ":\\v", ":se", ":SE"]
    replace: "↴"
  - triggers: [":\\>", ":\\v", ":se", ":SE"]
    replace: "⮧"

# SOUTH WEST ARROW
  - triggers: [":</", ":v/", ":sw", ":SW"]
    replace: "↙"
  - triggers: [":</", ":v/", ":sw", ":SW"]
    replace: "⇙"
  - triggers: [":</", ":v/", ":sw", ":SW"]
    replace: "⬋"
  - triggers: [":</", ":v/", ":sw", ":SW"]
    replace: "↲"
  - triggers: [":</", ":v/", ":sw", ":SW"]
    replace: "↵"
  - triggers: [":</", ":v/", ":sw", ":SW"]
    replace: "⮠"
  - triggers: [":</", ":v/", ":sw", ":SW"]
    replace: "⮦"
  - triggers: [":</", ":v/", ":sw", ":SW"]
    replace: "⤶"
    

# LEFT RIGHT ARROW
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "↔"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "↭"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "↮"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⇔"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⬌"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⇋"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⇌"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "↹"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⇆"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⇄"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⇿"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⥊"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⥋"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⥎"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⥐"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⇹"
  - triggers: [":<>", ":<->"]
    replace: "⇼"
        
# UP DOWN ARROW
  - triggers: [":^v", ":v^", ":^|v", ":v|^"]
    replace: "↕"
  - triggers: [":^v", ":v^", ":^|v", ":v|^"]
    replace: "⇕"
  - triggers: [":^v", ":v^", ":^|v", ":v|^"]
    replace: "⇳"
  - triggers: [":^v", ":v^", ":^|v", ":v|^"]
    replace: "⬍"
  - triggers: [":^v", ":v^", ":^|v", ":v|^"]
    replace: "⇅"
  - triggers: [":^v", ":v^", ":^|v", ":v|^"]
    replace: "⇵"
  - triggers: [":^v", ":v^", ":^|v", ":v|^"]
    replace: "↨"
  - triggers: [":^v", ":v^", ":^|v", ":v|^"]
    replace: "⥌"
  - triggers: [":^v", ":v^", ":^|v", ":v|^"]
    replace: "⥍"
  - triggers: [":^v", ":v^", ":^|v", ":v|^"]
    replace: "⥏"
  - triggers: [":^v", ":v^", ":^|v", ":v|^"]
    replace: "⥑"

# CROSS ARROWS
  - triggers: [":<X>", ":^Xv"]
    replace: "⤧"
  - triggers: [":<X>", ":^Xv"]
    replace: "⤩"
  - triggers: [":<X>", ":^Xv"]
    replace: "⤪"
  - triggers: [":<X>", ":^Xv"]
    replace: "⤨"


# CLOCKWISE 
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "⥁"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "↻"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "↷"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "⤸"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "⤵"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "⤶"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "↴"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "⮧"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "⮤"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "↱"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "⮣"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "↲"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "↵"
  - triggers: [":cloc", ":O>", ":>O"]
    replace: "⮠"
    
# ANTI CLOCKWISE
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "⥀"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "↺"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "↶"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "⤹"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "⮌"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "⮍"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "⮎"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "⮏"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "⤴"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "⤷"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "↰"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "⮢"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "⮥"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "↳"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "⮡"
  - triggers: [":anti", ":O<", ":<O"]
    replace: "⮦"
